com.pixolus.meterreading

Interface CameraListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BarcodeReadingListener, MeterReadingListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MeterReadingActivity

    public interface CameraListener
    This is the base interface of MeterReadingListener and BarcodeReadingListener.

    The MeterReadingFragment reports camera and view related events by invoking callbacks on the Activity that is was instantiated from. This interface holds all callbacks that you have to implement in your activity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCameraReady(MeterReadingFragment meterReadingFragment)
      This method is called right after the connection to the camera is established.
      void onLayoutChanged(MeterReadingFragment meterReadingFragment, boolean changed, int left, int top, int right, int bottom)
      This method is invoked when the layout of the MeterReadingFragment is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onCameraReady

        void onCameraReady(MeterReadingFragment meterReadingFragment)
        This method is called right after the connection to the camera is established.

        You can use it to perform any additional setup or present feedback that you want to happen before the live preview and image processing starts (adjust layout, play a sound, etc.).

        Important: This callback may be called multiple times while the activity is active. E.g. if the camera preview is visible and you switch to a different app and back, the connection to the camera gets released (while your app is in the background) and is re-established (when your app comes to the foreground again). In your implementation of this callback you need to make sure that it can be safely invoked multiple times.

        Parameters:
        meterReadingFragment - The fragment that originated the call.

      • onLayoutChanged

        void onLayoutChanged(MeterReadingFragment meterReadingFragment,
                     boolean changed,
                     int left,
                     int top,
                     int right,
                     int bottom)
        This method is invoked when the layout of the MeterReadingFragment is changed. You can use it to adapt the layout of your Activity to the modified layout of the fragment. Also if you have custom overlays to this view or make use of the RegionOfInterest feature, you should probably adapt them in this call.
        Parameters:
        meterReadingFragment - The MeterReadingFragment that originated the call.
        changed - Did the layout change?
        left - The x coordinate of the left side of the view.
        top - The y coordinate of the top side of the view.
        right - The x coordinate of the right side of the view.
        bottom - The y coordinate of the bottom side of the view.
